snippet.title: The Devourer: Hunted Souls | Game Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Another The Devourer: Hunted Souls Official Game Trailer in nice and smooth 60 FPS!

Be ready for a multiplayer paranormal investigation story horror game and experience it in VR as well.

Play as one of five different investigators with your friends or solo in our paranormal investigation horror game! Discover a story together and try to stay alive. Can you lift the curse? 

Powered by Unreal Engine 5.

Early Acces launch date: Between Q2 and Q3 2023.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2309400/The_Devourer_Hunted_Souls
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/5Jp46KY9sd
Support us on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ztekstudio/the-devourer-hunted-souls
